name: Prism (itch) (smumpy)
description: Prism is a throwback experience to the best arcade games of the 1980's! Created to not only give you hundreds of hours of pure, unadulterated fun but also seamlessly teach you the color spectrum! Learn all about the differences between primary, secondary and complementary colors without ever losing sight of the awesomeness that is Prism! Choose from a wide variety of power-ups to help you accomplish your goal of absorbing all the enemies and beating the game! Enjoy Prism today!
